titles.title: In the matter of Representative Newt Gingrich.

action.text: Mrs. Johnson asked unanimous consent that the time for debate on the resolution be extended for an additional 30 minutes. Without objection, the unanimous consent request was agreed to.

DEBATE - The Speaker pro tempore announced that the resolution constituted privileged status and the House proceeded with ninety minutes of debate, equally divided and controlled between the Chairwoman and the Ranking Minority Member of the Committee.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 395 - 28, 5 Present (Roll no. 8).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/21/1997--Introduced. Adopts the report of the Select Committee on Ethics dated January 17, 1997, regarding Representative Newt Gingrich.
